content.detailedDescription:
1. i was a passanger driving down coit towards i-635.
2. we (me and the driver) both noticed a large glowing orb of light heading the same way as we were parallel to the earths surface about 5-6 hundred feet above the ground. it lite up all the clouds around it with an unexplainable glow as the object then seemed to dissolve into nothing the same way it appeared.
3. my first thought was that it looked like missle the way it was traveling but only for a moment because of the amazing white glow that surrounded it. i knew it wasn't some kind of fire work or flare simply because you could tell it was a rather large object emitting the glow and traveling at a very fast starting and ending in the sky above.
4. it seemed to stay the same distance as the contour of the earth. 
5. frustrated and curious as to what it was. i wanted to talk about it but it's hard to find the words to describe. 
6. it disapeared the same way it appeared. it seemed to materialize in and out of sight.
content.summary: Large glowing orb

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 9:06 pm i stepped out my back door.  i looked up at the sky because it was a cold crisp night very clear and the stars were very bright.  as i looked at mars and the three stars that make up the belt of orion i saw a formation of pinpoints of light that were of the magnitude of dim stars, moving in a south southeasterly direction in a straight line, amber in color.  i think there was three to five of them flying in exact formation.  they traversed the sky in only seconds.  they were silent.  they were not aircraft with strobelights, as there were a some of these in the sky.  i cannot be sure if it was a single object or 3 to five objects.  i cannot say definitively the altitude of this object(s), it could have been 3 to five objects fairly close into the earth in space or could have been a craft flying at high altitude within the atmosphere. i feel like it was a craft of some sort, but since the sighting lasted only one or two seconds i cannot be sure, but let me assure you this was not a natural phenomena.  i have seen meteors, this was not a meteor, because there was no streak or trail of debri following after them.  

this sighting is something unlike anything i have seen before, i was stunned.  i am stunned.
content.summary: Triangular formation of amber lights sighted moving in southeatserly direction at a high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: I have been reluctant to report this until now - i was sitting in the shaded area of my back yard - looking in a eastery direction - i observed this brown cylinder shaped "tank like" cross the sky at about a 30 degree height angle from the horizion.��� at first i thought it might have been an emply booster from a space shuttle returning to earth - i would estimate the altitude at about 10,000 ft - i saw it clearly since at that angle the sun iluminated very well - the sky was clear.��� i dismissed the booster idea because it retraced the arc in the opposite direction.��� the time of observation was less than 1 minute - then about a two to three minute period until it came back at about the same speed - which i would consider very fast.��� it made no sound and did not live a vapor trail.I have since move back to pennsylvania -���
content.summary: Cylinder shaped - brownish colored.  looked very large - at least the size of a railroad tanker -  crossed the sky - then retraced the arc about 2 minutes later

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on i-75 near exit 142, which is close to warner robbins, ga on december 26th at approximately 8:15 pm.  i was with my mother (passenger seat, not paying attention), brother (back right seat, asleep), and father (back left seat, asleep) and we were on our way home to the atlanta area from miami, fl.  at the point where i saw the object, the interstate was on a downward slope and my car was at the top of a hill so that i could see down pretty far.  the highway dipped down and a mile or so down the road it sloped back upward.  there were lots of trees and billboards, etc., on each side of the highway, but there were no overpasses for about 3-4 miles north from where i was.
it was a cloudy night and i could see no stars.  i wasn't able to see any airplanes that night until about 9 pm.  while driving i was very alert, wide awake, and concentrating on the road ahead of me.  all of a sudden, from behind the tree-line on my left (west), a very bright, large, and extremely fast-moving star-like object appeared to come off the horizon and shoot across the interstate at approximately a 30 degree angle.  it proceeded to move at this very rapid rate until it was past the tree line on my right (east) and was out of sight.  it seemed to disappear behind the clouds, but i can't be sure.  the object looked to be about 2-3 miles down the road from me.  the diameter of the bright area was about twice as big as the diameter of the bright area of a headlight from a very close oncoming truck, except it was much farther.  the object's size and brightness remained constant throughout the entire time (about 1.5-2 seconds).
my first reaction to seeing this was complete shock.  the object's size and intensity, and the fact that it came without warning, really took me by surprise.  i immediately tried to see where it went and i slowed down to see if i could get a glimpse of it or anything unusual to the east of my location.  my brother and father were asleep in the backseat and my mother was not paying attention to anything, but i started asking, "wow did you see that?!"  she had her eyes closed and i was upset because i wanted someone to explain it to me.  once i realize i was alone in seeing it (in my car at least), i went back to driving.  however, i spent the rest of the drive home analyzing the situation in my mind, as the images of the event were burned into my brain.  i ruled out a car due to size, speed, point of origin, and angle.  an airplane was also ruled out for the same reasons, plus the fact that i had been unable to see any at that point due to cloud cover.  i ruled out a meteor due to size (i've never seen a shooting star anywhere near this size), point of origin (it started from ground level and ascended), angle (meteors seem to go across the sky, this went from ground up), and the fact that the object's size and brightness remained constant throughout (meteors burn up completely or hit the earth at a smaller size than when they start out).  the cloud cover would also rule out the ability to see a shooting star.  as soon as i got home (around 10 pm), i drew a rough sketch of what i saw (what i have attached is an updated, cleaner version made in ms paint).  i actually was a little frightened by the sighting for the rest of the night, and i could not stop thinking about it.
although i am a believer, i had never seen a ufo, and even when i saw this i remained skeptical.  i have waited a few days to report it because i wanted to be completely sure that i could not find an explanation of what it was in the sky that night.
content.summary: Very fast and large star-like object took off from horizon and flew across interstate

content.detailedDescription: It was mars...It was really close to the moon on december 24, 2007.  i took pictures of the event and got really good pics.  they were taken in madison county, texas.
content.summary: To answer the guy in pa..Not ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my daughter's house at about 10-10:30 pm.  i looked at the full moon and there was a star like object in the 4 or 5 o'clock position from the moon.  i have never noticed this before.  it appeared very close to the moon.  it seemed to be still & was slightly yellowish if i remember correctly.  when i got home about 20 minutes later it was still there.  i went in the house and kind of forgot about it until i read the report from the person in colorado who saw what sounds like the same thing.
content.summary: It was exactly as the person from colorado described (the same night)

content.detailedDescription: I was at six flags over texas in arlington assisting a man with his camera.  as we were looking at the camera we noticed a white flash like a camera flash. like a light or something.  then we looked up and saw the blue ball with a green glow around it with a white tail. it was moving across the sky from the southeast around duncanville and moved north of me and wrapped around to the west toward fort worth.  i was looking north and it pretty much moved east to west. i thought it was a comet because when it went by i was waiting for more. the ball was about the size of a marble in the sky and seemed to be as high as an airplane.  it took about 5 or 10 seconds to go across the sky. i did'nt see where it finished because there as a roller coaster ride blocking by view.  it was a blue ball that glowed green and the tail close to the ball was green but it tapered off to white. the tail was about 5 times the length of the ball.  it did not make a sound.  the guy next to me saw it and said "you don't see those everyday. that was pretty awesome".  there was about 100 to 200 people in the area around me and i did'nt see anyone else point up to the sky or even pay attention to me.  another guy i know saw it too but he was at a different part of the park.  he said it looked just like what i saw except he said it looked more like a big green comet.  i mentioned that i say a blue comet and he said that he saw it too except it looked more green to him.
content.summary: A blue sphere with a white tail moving east to west  parallel to the ground.

content.detailedDescription: I work the 3rd shift ,and at 3:00am i was doing my rounds.I steped outside and was looking east.I observed a star like object appear about 1 inch from the morning star to its left,looking at it from my view.The object was stationary and grew in intensity and size,probably the size of a pea.The brightness got to a point of intense white light. (very bright)the star like object then diminished in size  but stayed bright and then vanished.
content.summary: Looking east a exspanding star like object increased in brightness then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving work when i noticed a bright pulsing light in the eastern sky i started my car up then followed the object then it suddenly vanished now i don't know how it got away so quickly because when i first saw it it was moving slowly it left me feeling confused
content.summary: Bright pulsing light

content.detailedDescription:
i will be as detailed as i can, but this event happened about 40 years ago.
   me, mom and dad, and my two brothers were driving from lovington, nm to roswell, nm to visit our grandparents.  the entire drive would take about an hour and a half.  it was dusk on the lonely road and there was very little or no traffic.  at about an hour into the drive i noticed a bright object to the right of the car and mentioned it.  immediately, this object was directly above the car.  at the same time, the radio went to static and we heard the speedometer cable break, and it actually felt like the hair on my head was standing up.  there was no sound, but there was light everywhere.  the object, above, was so large that i could see it from the back seat as i looked straight ahead.  besides the extremely bright light above, i could see colored lights at the peremeter, also it seemed as though the light was coming from inside the car.  i had never been so terrified in my life and i just "froze" where i was.  my middle brother was climbing between the front and back seats, and my youngest brother was only three, so he didn't seem to react.  the scariest part, to me, was that i saw a huge black eye staring directly at me from the window beside me.  it seems that the eye was more in my "minds eye" than an actual eye.  the shape was typical of many reports.  it was a translucent black teardrop shape.  i can feel my heart beating rapidly as
i recall this event, even though it has been 40 years ago.
   the next time i remembered anything our car was heading toward a ditch alongside the road.  dad quickly turned the stearing wheel and kept the car on the road.  we were all so terrified that all of us were completely silent.  we soon pulled into our grandparents driveway to see the frantic looks on their faces.  my grandfather said, "what happened i was just about to call the state police to look for you".  my grandfather asked what took us so long.  a one and a half trip took three hours.  i don't remember almost anything of what was said, but i remember the feeling of terror that gripped us all.
    i am 54 years old now and one brother is 51 and the other 44. my father is 75 years old and my mother, 72.  i have had nightmeres throughout the years although they have lessened with time. i am still very afraid of being abducted, and my heart races everytime i think about it.  recently my youngest brother and i were looking  for apache tears near gabbs, nevada and it was beginning to turn dark.  we were in the middle of nowhere and were headed toward fallon, nevade.  as we were heading back i noticed a light near the sky's horizon and i was instantly "at the caprock again".  i didn't say anything about it, and i prayed that it wasn't what i feared.  this time the light that looked like a star or planet was a star or planet.  i have told a few people about this event, but probably no more than 20.  strangely, almost everyone seems to believe me.  i would like to know what happened but at the same time i am too terrified to know any more.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Missing time at the caprock 35 miles east of roswell nm

content.detailedDescription: It was a cloudless, clear night with bright stars. as i stood in my back yard (with my dog - out for walkies) looking at the stars to the south, four bright, fast-moving white-blue lights in a delta shape (two lights evenly spaced - 2 ft. apart at arm's distance - on each side) appeared in the sky at about a 45 degree angle, flashed briefly, moved north, flashed again, and repeated this pattern about 5-6 times as they moved to the north overhead. there was no noise, and no reflection...Then they disappeared. duration of event was approx. 30 seconds. the lights were about as big as those of a streetlight - but far higher in the sky. (they were the size of a thumbnail at arm's distance). this object was completely foreign to me; the closest thing i could compare it to would be the lights on the underside of an airplane - however there was no engine noise, no jet trail, it was lower than  any plane would fly and this is nothing like i've ever seen before.
content.summary: 4 bright blue delta-shaped lights with white haze around them flashed overhead and passed by

content.detailedDescription:
Every evening after sunset untill sunrise about 30 degrees elevation due east a bright light could be seen from approximately november 15th 2007 thru december 20th 2008 as seen from the east coast over brooklyn new york city as seen by several witiness including the oilers and engineer's
at the owls head water pollution control plant 6700 shore road brooklyn new york 11220 ,telephone number 1718-477-0105.
i personally witiness the event at least 4 or five times.
a bright white steady light, did not flutter like a star or other object like a star,which is why i filed this report. because it was a steady light and others i worked with noticed and eventually, that is what attracted my attention.

their appeard to be a press release,circa december in the local papers including the t.V. some research needs to be done in this area.

speculation: 
base on my cursory investigation, my preliminarily opinion is that this object appeared to be a satellite or other man made object. i due not believe at  this time that the object was a natural or celestial event. if so, possibly a exercise of-a-kind.
content.summary: Brighest light in the sky, due east, 30 degree's elevation, approximately as seen from the owls head water pollution control plant 6700 shore road brooklyn new york telephone number 1718-748-3177.

content.detailedDescription: i was at home and stepped out on my porch for a breath of fresh air at about 7pm. i enjoy looking at the the stars but am by no means an atronomer so this very well could have been a comet or meteor. it was a clear night and the stars were all very clear. when  i first looked up i could see many stars. i at first thout this light was a planet or star because it was very bright and did not seem to be in motion. i sat down on the porch for a few miniuts just thinking and looking at the stars. as the miniuts passed the object i thought was a star almost imperceptively moved and continued moving west north west. it began to grow dimmer and appeared further away though if anyone had looked up they would never have been suspicious becaus it moved so slowly you would have taken it for a star.I judged its movement by powerlines and a telephone pole. the object had moved from one side of the pole to the other and no matter how i tilted my head i could not see it from the side of the pole it had been on.It had been on the left side of the pole and finally reached the right side after ten to fifteen miniuts. also it gradually grew dimmer and went out of sight. as i have already stated it moved very slowly possibly over toward whitehouse tn. it took about 20 miniuts for it to be out of sight completely. i wish i had caught it sooner i might of had a better veiw. do heavenly bodies such as comets or meteors move that slowly? probably, however i saw no tail. i am completely sober and as far as i am aware, i am of sound mind. just thought it was worth mentioning. thankyou for all you do.
content.summary: Very slow moving light in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Im a truck driver and i was going west bound on i40 just coming to the top of the mt at needles ca i saw what looks like a rocket or a missile shooting into space i didn't notice anything in the sky that it would be shooting at till my co driver pointed at what looked like a star  the missile never made it to the star object  the weird thing about all this is that the star was slowly moving away it started real bright then it slowly got smaller and dimmer till it eventually disappeared i never saw anything in the news about it
content.summary: Looked like a star

content.detailedDescription:
In 1973 i with my sister and mother and several neighbors observered a bright light near our house that would rise and fall behind some woods near a power line and would every few minutes would brighten up like a welders arc.
this continued for sometime during dusk (comet kahotek-not sure of spelling-was making it closest approach to earth during this time)and from what i remember about this event i observed that it wasn't swamp gas nor anyform of aircraft known at the time(completely silent)just a bright light with no shape of any sort.
this event happened more than 30 years ago and this is all i remember of it and at the time i was most impressed by the brightness and lack of any shape since the sun had just gone down but there was still enought light to see my neighborhood by as well as there was no sound to this ufo, to this day i dont have any idea what it was. this event took place in my hometown of landis n.C.
content.summary: Ufo was starlike light occassionally brilliant

content.detailedDescription: Was heading home from walmart off tower and i70. i noticed and round abject next to the moon that appeared at first to be a star. what was odd was how bright it was and that the moon was full and did not outshine the object. i observed the object for about 15 minutes before i got home. i tried to take a picture but all you could see was the moon.  the object appeared at the lower right side of the moon around 5 o'clock.
content.summary: Object next to full moon

content.detailedDescription: I had taken my dogs out to do their business when i looked up to see four lights revolving in a counter clockwise direction and then they all crossed to the middle of the circle, spinned a bit, then they moved outward and revolved again.  these lights were behind a cloud cover. i watched for several minutes then i called my sister and observed for several more minutes while describing to her what i was seeing.  at first i thought it might be lights for a grand opening but i know the light display would not be moving as this one did.  i came back into my home and several minutes later, i went out again and the lights were still there. i reported this sighting to nuforc and told them it was ongoing.  around 11:00 p.M., i took the dogs out again before bedtime but the lights were not present.  today, in the daytime, i see those same clouds. if they return tonight, i am calling the police to witness or i'm calling a local news channel.  i was afraid to take a photo for fear that i would be beamed up but tonight i will prepare my camera.  this sighting seemed very close to earth and if i were to describe its size, i would say football field size.  i find it hard to believe no one around here has made the same report - at least i don't think they have.
content.summary: 4 lights running counter clockwise, then crossing to the middle and then out again

content.detailedDescription: We have many pictures with strange objects that appeared only after downloading in the computer. most of the pictures were taken in the spring of 2007.
content.summary: Random ufo

content.detailedDescription: Objects not seen at the time the picture was taken.  no sound was heard.
content.summary: Objects appeared after downloading into computer.

content.detailedDescription: Scanning the sky in missouri city texas at 12:03 am using a gen 3 night vision scope. watching an extremely large flying wing pass directly over between 2,000 and 3,000 ft headed south. the vehicle color appeared light gray against the black sky as it passed over blocking the stars. the detail and outline was very sharp and clear. no smoke or noise. the wing shape was much like the old yb-49 flying wing bomber and much like the large vehicle recorded in arizona. this is within controlled houston hobby airport tca airspace and this vehicle was at least 4 times larger than the typical southwest airlines aircraft. i have seen the large black triangle aircraft very close, within 100 ft distance as they pass along the fema controlled rivers property headed towards the gulf of mexico several times in the past. these black triangle always have an armed f16 escort when traveling. this flying wing type of vehicle was much larger and faster.
content.summary: Extremely large flying wing aircraft 4+ times larger than 747

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my front yard late in the evening in mineral county, wv,just looking at the view. the date is just an estimate could have been a 1979 or 1980, i was on top of mountain that overlooked a long valley that ends in grant county, wv.  i looked up and saw a dark object in sky, at first i thought it was a cloud like the other clouds which were dark as the sun was setting and illuminating the bottoms of the clouds. but i kept looking at it, it was disc shaped with a dome on bottom or top, unable to tell which it was. i thought it might be a helocopter but there was no sound. i was thinking of what it might be, i felt some growing fear because i thought it might be a ufo and i was there alone and far from neighbors. just as i thought about going into the house to get a camera, it began to fly away, very fast down through the valley to the south, grant county or hardy county, and was out of sight in less than 30 seconds (atleast 20 miles away). i checked the newspapers the next day and there as a story of another sighting. i called that person but their sighting was of lights, not a disc shaped object like i saw.
content.summary: Disc shaped object with dome on top or bottom was motionless in sky about 500 feet up then flew off very fast to south with no sound

content.detailedDescription: I live in port st.Lucie florida this morning december 28th at bout 6:13 a.M. i witnessed a craft that went from east as far as you could see to the west in about 3 to 5 seconds it appeared to have a largewhite or clear light on the front of the craft and on the back it had a large red light.There were airplanes you could see in the distance with there lights flashing and this object appeared to be as big as about 5 of them long. after it was in the west it stopped for a split second then it disappeared the whole time the lights were on nothing flashing and this object was about have the distance as normal plane flying from earth was. i then got my wife and told her to come watch and didnt see anything so she left for work.Still amazed by what i saw i stould there for another 10 minutes or so and another object appeared from the north this time it as bright as a star and looked to be as far away as the stars were it was very clear this morning so you could see far.I then called my wife and told her where ever she was at pull the car over and get out and look towards the moon by this time the object was close to the moon going from north to south across the sky she told me she did see the same object as i did and it continued across the sky and out of sight.This object the whole time it was visible appeared to be as bright as a star while moving this could not have been a plane as there were many this morning in the air and you could definately tell the difference.This object appeared to be as high as the stars as it past through the sky you could tell it was considerably much higher above the planes and didnt change the tone of light the whole time telling me it could have possibly been in space and reflecting of the sun.Thank you for your time i hope other people possibly has seen the same thing.
content.summary: Craft as large a 5 airplanes

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were walking back from a 24hr conveince store on dec 12 1993 at 4:15 am we just entered into the 1st eastern driveway of the lord tennison  apartment complex and she said do you see that i looked up to see two ufo's side by side the size of an average single prop " piper cub type" aircraft they made no sound and looked like two backward hard hats in shape "very simalar to the shape of a horseshoe crab" each glowing dim blue and the texture of rough fiberglass flying north to south slowly like an aircraft coming in for a landing on the botton i saw a raised square like a hatch door or engine compartment on the top of them on each side was a raised area that if they were made of clay would look as though someone pushed up the sides with thier thumbs making what looked like lips or a wave at the ocean in the middle of the lips the shape of a hard hat was consistant i ran after them wanting to see as much as i could untill they flew out of sight 45 minutes later another ufo flying slow like the others flew in the exsact same flight path as if fallowing a lazer beam this one was much larger about the size of a 737 passanger jet it was glowing a dim yellow same rough fiberglass texture this one was shaped like three triangles stuck toghether at the rear and stretching very long to the front with the middle one sticking out the farthest no sound i was at first very excited "like riding a roller coaster " but soon after was filled with fear i dont think they are friendly thats just my opinion but then ask yourself when was the last time you heard of a friendly abduction ufo or otherwise ?
content.summary: Two hard hat shaped side by side flying slow under cloud covered sky heading north  to south  no sound same craft as seen in crashed russian military footage

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were both very tired driving back from a concert in denver to greeley. she was driving north on i-25 and i was in the passenger seat. when we saw the object, we were between longmont and loveland. i noticed the object at about midnight because of its brightness, it was on my side of vision, on the east side of the highway. it was very fast and low on the horizon and had a bright green trail with an orange center. the trail was about a mile wide and a couple of miles long. i lost sight of the object when it appeared to crash. my first reaction was shock and i shouted an expletive. the object caught my friend's eye out of her peripheral vision and she was surprised as well i checked to see what time it was to see if there was any substantial time loss, but i couldn't really tell if there was any since i was unsure of the exact time of the event. it was very unusual and unlike any meteor i've seen while viewing meteor showers. i thought it was either space junk or a ufo because the trail was thicker and it was lower than a normal meteorite. my friend and i both believe that it seemed out of the ordinary. i  was slightly scared, but more excited. now i fear that if an object did crash it has already been recovered.
content.summary: Fireball with bright green trail, about a mile wide, appeared to crash

content.detailedDescription: Me and charlie came home from helena after going out to eat and shopping for what we would be eating for breakfast the next day.We pulled up the driveway which is at end of the road were i live in the summer.We were in the car and we saw a light just over the trees off to the right,the trees are about 70 feet tall. we watched it as it was slowly going away from us it stayed at the same distence above the trees but was more to the open side of the property it just slowly was moving and all of a sudden it was as if the light went off and we couldn,t see it anymore.It just turn the light off.
content.summary: Came home with future brother in law on property in the mountain i bought-

content.detailedDescription: I was moving from justin tx back to fort worth, south on 35 coming up to alliance airport.. this dark diamond shape small aircraft came from alliance it caught my eye as soon as it left the horizon, and shot straight across the highway at a 45 degree angle at a warp type speed and disapeared in the blue sky at that same 45 degree angle .Most plane out of alliance fly north and south the way the runways lay..I thought that was odd to see one headed east . my first thought after it was over..Is that is the exact same one i saw in 1995..About the same time of day but it flew into carswell.. i was driving north on santa faye south of carwell airforce base you can see carswell fro there,,this ufo came from the west so fast and turned left 45 degree turn like i have never seen ,,never changing speed and landed on a dime, so to speak,, i could not see anymore i was driving and the street started going down hill and i was running late,i wanted to drive over as close as i could get to that area and see closer but did not..,anyway i have never seen this plane any other time.. i have always keeped one eye on the sky  nothing can fly that fast..The object was small diamond shape and black or dark in color.. its action was starts out fast at the ground and disapears fast as a dot in the sky..And can turn a 45 degree angle at the speed.. my feelings about this,,i think this is one great flying machine and i would love to see it at the next airshow...In 17 years i have seen this in broad day light on a work day twice in the fort worth area.
content.summary: Diamond shape  small dark aircraft shot straight across 45 degree angel at moc speed  and disappeared in the blue sky at 45 degree angle..

content.detailedDescription:
Four of us were filling the 1st silo. they were; martin l. tschantz, deceased, and my sons, rick and ron tschantz. rick saw a light that appeared stationary over the woods, and asked me to look at it. i told him that it was an airplane turning and that is why it appeared stationary. we finished unloading the last load, and pulled the tractors into the barn. we began to walk up around the barn, and rick said "dad, you were right because here it comes!"
the saucer pulled up about 80 to 100 feet away, and stopped. it was approximately 200 to 300 feet up.  it had a light gray body which appeared very smooth. on the upper portion there was a small round plexiglass(?) cabin, which was obviously lighted, but was opaque from the outside. i asked ron to run into the house and get my binoculars, which he did.
ron viewed it with the binoculars, and finally i got them and focused on the saucer. i would guess that the saucer bottom was approximately 30 to 40 feet long. the cabin was not more than 5 foot in diameter. there was a most peculiar piece sticking up on the right side of the cabin. it looked like the light off of a ww2 truck. similarly, on the bottom of the saucer was a circular flange, perpendicular to the saucer body, which extended down. the flange seemed to be the axis of the propellant, and with the binoculars i could see a flickering light reflected on the flange. it looked like the arc of a dc welder. the bottom, inside the flange was open.

the saucer gave a very soft hum, and i could not see any screw heads or any method of joining the dished part of the structure. from this, i assumed that the grey saucers were turning.
the structure remained in place, not wobbling or moving, until it began to move very slowly toward the west, where the sun had just set, but the sky was still light. it gained speed like a mathematical progression, and disappeared into the sunset.
content.summary: Appeared over woods, then came to us, stopped, and then left going west.

content.detailedDescription: On december 25,2007, my wife, 2 sleeping daughters and i were driving home fom a christmas eve dinner, i was driving and my wife was awake in passenger seat. it was 12:20 am and we were driving north on state highway 29 which runs north and south along the delaware river. it is a dark, somewhat isolated road and at this hour we were the only car on the road. about 4 miles south of frenchtown. we were travelling at about 55 miles an hour and we came around a slight curve to the right, directly in front of us high in the sky, moving fom sky to land was an enormous globe(sphere) of perfectly round shape, very,very bright with no discernable other color. the object was moving at an extreme speed toward the tree line on our right or across from the bank of the delaware river. the sighting lasted 3 or 4 seconds. there was no impact, explosion or any other sign of disruption on the ground. my wife and i both saw the same thing. i have never seen such a sight before. neither of us had been drinking. i contacted the local police and nobody had repoted seeing this object.There are no airports, military bases, industrial sites or power plants in the area. the area is rural farm and/or wooded. this sighting was extremely unusual.The sighting was at first somewhat frightening because it was so unexpected but now we are just simply intrigued. i do not know what it was but i know some things it was not; it was not a commercial aircraft,helicopter, search light, reflection, swamp gas, reflection of my vehicle, fireworks or anything vaguely resembling "normal".
content.summary: Chritmas morning my wife and i saw a very bright and etremely large sphereof light over delaware river valley.

content.detailedDescription: My elderly mother and i were sitting out infront of the garage one night talking. as i pointed to the "big dipper" and was explaining to her the star formations of it, i noticed what seemed like a light of a plane at a very low altitude coming from the direction of the "big dipper". as it drew nearer i began to notice there were no red or green blinking lights flashing on it as other planes have. in astonishment, as it came closer, i jumped out of my chair and said excitedly,"hey mom! i don't hear any engine noise at all, do you?!" in amazement herself, my mother stood up out of her chair quickly and exclaimed excitingly,"no billy, i don't hear any noise either!" as it quietly passed right over us i observed that it was a white lighted glowing sphere. it had what seemed to be a long rectangular window at the base of it that did not glow at all. it passed over us at a very low altitude---say about 150 to 200 feet above us, not a sound! and was moving quite fast, about 2 or 300 m.P.H. and kept going in the same direction behind us as it vanished from our sight!  my mother and i were so excited exclaiming to one another in high tones of puzzlement,"did you see that!" "what was that!"  we talked about it for days to our friends and family, and are still talking and remembering it down to this day. my mother said,"i beleive now!" this white glowing sphere was about the size of a small two story house in my estimation.
content.summary: What looked like a plane light headed coming toward us, turned out to be a white glowing sphere passing over us.

content.detailedDescription:
I was working part-time nights at a data entry company located off route 46 in little falls, new jersey. i had just finished for the night and was headed home. i use the back roads to get home, so i got off route 46 onto a side street. this street usually the cars travel pretty fast on, but this night there was a lone car traveling really slow in front of me. i thought that was strange until i looked up and saw this huge object flying over this road it was flying really slow. it looked like it just came out of the woods on the left side of this road. i was a little scared because this thing made no noise at all and it just glided across so smoothly. i didn't want to get out of my car because i thought something else would happen (i've seen many documentaries on ufo abductions).
 this object was rectangular shape,metallic and had red bubble-like lights under the aircraft. 
 i could not mistake this thing for nothing else. it was flying at the hight of a tree. this was really hard for me to tell anyone because there was nothing in the news about this object that flew over the road i was on to route 46,a very busy highway.
 when i came home i called the police station and asked the police officer who answered the phone had they recieved any phone calls regarding anything strange happening over the area i just came from. this officer made me feel really stupid, he said,"what a like a ufo" he was being a real jerk about my question. since then i really don't talk to anyone about this night.
content.summary: The object flew over my car . it was very low and huge. it made no sound  and it just glided across the road  i was traveling on.
